name: More to the Story with H. Allegra Lansing

episodes.title: ORDER IN THE CULT! Courtroom Sketches of the Manson Family on Trial
episodes.description:
During the Manson Family's 1970/1971 Trial for the Tate/LaBianca murders, at least two notable artists were employed to sketch the daily activities. Bill Lagnante and Bill Robles each contributed sketches during the trial that depict the notoriety and shock defendants Charles Manson, Susan Atkins, Patricia Krenwinkel and Leslie Van Houten depicted on jurors, the court, and the world. Plus, one more person came into the courtroom intending to sketch but wound up falling in love with MANSON!

Sketch images copyright to Bill Lagnante or Bill Robles. All other images cited as known.

episodes.title: MANSON to ZIZ and In Between: Faces of Modern Cults
episodes.description: Do you think people who join cults are stupid, uneducated or weak? You might be surprised to learn that very bright, highly educated and sophisticated people are also susceptible to cults and charlatans. In fact, every person on the planet is! In this video we explore some modern cults - from The Manson Family, to the Peoples' Temple, the Source Family, Aum Shinrikyo, Heaven's Gate, NXIVM and the most recent cult breaking news currently - the Zizians. #zizians
